Package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChromaticAdaptation
    Interface specifying a chromatic adaptation transform.
    Illuminant  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BradfordAdaptation
    This class represents a linear chromatic adaptation transform, mapping XYZ color coordinates from a source white (reference) point to a target white point.
    CieUtil
    This class defines static methods for working with CIE-XYZ color space.
    HlsColorSpace
    Implementation of HLS (hue/lightness/saturation) color space.
    HlsConverter Deprecated.
    HsvColorSpace
    Implementation of HSV (hue/saturation/value) color space.
    HsvConverter Deprecated.
    LabColorSpace
    This class implements the CIELab color space.
    LinearRgbColorSpace
    Basic linear RGB color space, related to sRGB by gamma correction.
    LuvColorSpace
    This class implements the CIELuv color space.
    sRgb65ColorSpace
    This class implements a D65-based sRGBcolor space without performing chromatic adaptation between D50 and D65, as required by Java's profile connection space.
    sRgbUtil
    This class defines static methods for gamma correction for sRGB which are used, e.g., by LabColorSpace and LuvColorSpace color spaces.
    XYZscalingAdaptation
    This class represents a linear chromatic adaptation transform, mapping XYZ color coordinates from a source white (reference) point to a target white point.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IccProfile  
    StandardIlluminant
    Enumeration of selected standard illuminants.
